input.sentences: i went to my friend 's wedding .
we all watched the new couple dance together .
there were some children there as well .
output.sentences: My friend's wedding is going to have a mid-century theme.
Here's the car they rented to take them to the church.
Gosh, the reception is decorated beautifully.
Watch this couple dance, they are so good.
The children had so much fun.
